Producer: Jonathan Blitstein, Richard J. Bosner, Julie Christeas, Marina Grasic, Jai Khanna, Lawrence Michael Levine, Aubrey Plaza, Sophia Takal
Production Co: Productivity Media, Tandem Pictures, Oakhurst Entertainment, Blue Creek Pictures
Synopsis: A filmmaker plays a calculated game of desire and jealousy in pursuit of a work of art that blurs the boundaries between autobiography and invention.
Title: Black Bear
